price: E dize: "Senhor meu! Refugio-me em Ti, contra as incitações dos demônios,
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
